    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99be6c77919f6b61b1978b6ec79ea539bcfef0d7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Size of the Sun and the Moon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe der Sonne und des Mondes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Taille du soleil et de la lune</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tamanho do sol e da lua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formato del sole e della luna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέγεθος του ήλιου και του φεγγαριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Talla del sol y de la luna</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustrations shows that the size of the Sun and the Moon appears to be the same. The distances of the Sun, Moon and Earth explain why.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">moon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">size</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigt Abbildungen, daß die Größe der 
Sonne und des Mondes scheint, zu sein dieselbe. Die Abstände 
der Sonne, des Mondes und der Masse erklären warum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce les illustrations prouve que la taille du 
soleil et de la lune semble être identique. Les distances du 
soleil, de la lune et de la terre expliquent pourquoi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este as ilustrações mostram que o tamanho do 
sol e da lua parece ser o mesmo. As distâncias do sol, da lua e
da terra explicam por que.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo le illustrazioni indica che il formato del
sole e della luna sembra essere lo stesso. Le distanze del sole,
della luna e della terra spiegano perchè.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις δείχνουν ότι το μέγεθος του 
ήλιου και του φεγγαριού εμφανίζεται να είναι το ίδιο. Οι 
αποστάσεις του ήλιου, του φεγγαριού και της γης εξηγούν γιατί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este las ilustraciones muestran que la talla del 
sol y de la luna aparece ser igual. Las distancias del sol, de 
la luna y de la tierra explican por qué.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mond</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Größe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la terre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">taille</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le soleil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">lua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">tamanho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luna</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">talla</string>
